segments.text: I was taking a walk when a young man came at me from nowhere and snatched the bag off my hands and ran away .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What did the young man look like ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , he's young , tall and thin .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: To which direction did he run ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me see ... my right arm ... oh , to the east .
segments.speaker: S1
